Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Kingsbridge is located in south Devon and is 40 miles south west of Exeter and 21 miles east of Plymouth. The property is located in the prime pitch on Fore Street. Nearby occupiers include WH Smith, Oxfam, Holland & Barrett and Vision Express.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The demise comprises a ground floor retail unit which has previously been sub-let from Lloyds bank. The property a ground floor retail unit with ancillary storage space on the first floor.

Rent
The property is available at a rent of £7,000 per annum.

Rates
From information provided by the Valuation Office website we are informed that the current rateable value of the bank is £8,600. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The premises are located on Fore Street – Brixhams pedestrianised shopping High Street. The property is only a short walk from the Harbour and close to the proposed supermarket development and town centre car park. Brixham is a well-established harbour and port and its associated tourist activity. The town is popular with both national and independent retailers, cafes, restaurants and pubs. Nearby occupiers include Boots the Chemist, Regatta Clothing, Co-op Convenience store, Labrokes and Santander.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with ancillary to upper floors. The overall unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 27 August 2023. Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent
£42,750 per annum exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is E.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £22,500 and the rates payable are £11,047.50 pa. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Plymouth is located in Devon and is approximately 45 miles south west of Exeter and 120 miles south west of Bristol. The unit is located on Royal Parade, adjacent Spar and the re-development of the former Derry’s Department Store that will provide a mix of hotel, student accommodation and retail.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with ancillary to basement. The overall unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 24 September 2026 subject to a tenant only break on 23 September 2021 subject to prior notice . Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent
£50,000 per annum exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is C.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £50,500 and the rates payable are £24,795.50 pa. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Plymouth is located in Devon and is approximately 45 miles south west of Exeter and 120 miles south west of Bristol. The unit is located on Mutley Plain, a suburb approximately 1 mile north of the city centre. The subject premises are located adjacent Starbucks and Wetherspoons.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with ancillary to upper floors. The overall unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 28 September 2028 subject to a tenant only break on 27 September subject to prior notice . Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent
£24,000 per annum exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is C.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £17,250 and the rates payable are £8,469.75 pa. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is located on The Strand, a popular trading location in the heart of the centre of Dawlish. Dawlish is a busy seaside tourist town particularly during the summer months. Dawlish is situated approximately 10 miles south east of Exeter, and 12 miles form Torquay. The railway station offers regular train services to Exeter and connections to all major southwest destinations. Nearby occupiers include Boots, Shoe Centre, and the Co-op Supermarket.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is arranged over three floors. The ground floor comprises of an old banking hall and office space. Part of the first floor comprises ancillary mezzanine accommodation, staff facilities and WC’s. The remaining part first floor and second floor accommodation comprises a vacant maisonette residential flat.

Rent
The property is available at a rent of £43,000 per annum.

Rates
From information provided by the Valuation Office website we are informed that the current rateable value of the bank is £32,750. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.
